definition: to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: If you plan on not attending class, make sure you have a buddy that will sign u in.
sentences.chinese: 要是你打算跷课，先保证有个家伙能帮你签到。

sentences.english: Pay at the door, cash only.
sentences.chinese: 活动当日付于签到到，接受现金。

sentences.english: Oh, there are sign-in sheets there. Thanks.
Kunlun Hotel next Friday to attend a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下星期五你到昆仑饭店去签到参加一个会议。

sentences.english: The convention delegates were asked to sign in at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 要求大会代表在站口签到。

sentences.english: Single Signin process should also be wrapped with main design.
sentences.chinese: 签到单包装过程也应与主设计。

sentences.english: Added Location Check-in by Pop-up Menu of the Input View.
sentences.chinese: 输入法弹出式功能表新增位置签到功能。

sentences.english: All the participants were required to sign in as they entered the hall to attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 出席会议的人在进入大厅前均须签到。

sentences.english: An AD card for the course?
That fell through but two months later we got Ronaldo.
sentences.chinese: 这件事虽然没成，但两个月之后我们签到了C罗。

sentences.english: The writing on the parchments changed about halfway down the pile.
sentences.chinese: 在签到一半时羊皮纸上的内容开始变化。

sentences.english: I signed in and crunched across the gravel to my room.
sentences.chinese: 我签到后嘎吱嘎吱走过石子路来到我的房间。

sentences.english: Guests signed their names on the attendance book.
There're some pet toys on the reception desk!
sentences.chinese: 签到桌上摆着一些宠物玩具。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, please go in and sign up.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这样，请进来并签到。

definition: (of an employee) to clock on (or off)/to punch in (or out)/(Tw) (on Facebook) to check in to a location
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
roll-call (e.g. at athletics event)/check the record
to scan a QR code or barcode
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
